notification.missing1: The trolleybuses are disconnected from the Orange network and have no internet connection. Trolleybus trackers are now being updated and will be appearing online on March 15th.
notification.missing2: At the moment, only route 30 and 32 work (they use an older generation of trackers that connect to the internet through SIM cards in another package).
